name: test_faithfulness[get_data7]
description: Validates that the model response remains faithful to the reference context for loyalty tier offers.

parameters.name: get_data
parameters.value: {'user_input': 'What happens if seats or ancillaries are chargeable but discounted?', 'reference_contexts': ['When seats or ancillaries such as baggage, meals, or seat selections are chargeable but discounted, it means they are optional add-ons offered at a lower price than the standard rate. Airlines provide such discounts to encourage customers to purchase additional services. The discounted price is applied on top of the base fare, allowing passengers to save money while still opting for extra services. These promotions are often part of loyalty benefits or sales campaigns, giving passengers flexibility and value while enabling the airline to increase ancillary revenue.'], 'reference': 'When seats or ancillaries are chargeable but discounted, they are optional add-ons offered at a lower cost than usual. Airlines provide these discounts to encourage purchases of extra services and boost revenue, while passengers benefit from reduced prices and flexible options.', 'synthesizer_name': 'single_hop_specific_query_synthesizer'}
